con:request.name: Sale 1 (Standard)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr1:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr1:CardNumber>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode>${=String.valueOf((int) Math.floor(Math.random()*1000000000))}</acr1:CustomerCode>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>mysupercooltestemailv${=String.valueOf((int) Math.floor(Math.random()*1000000000))}@mailinator.com</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr1:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber>${Sale 1 (Standard)#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Responses'; //tem:ProcessCreditCardResponse[1]/tem:ProcessCreditCardResult[1]/acr1:ReferenceNumber[1]}</acr1:ReferenceNumber> <acr1:Token>\r <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CustomerCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId>\r <acr2:Signature xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardExpirationDate xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardType xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr2:CardVerificationNumber> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:NameOnCard xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:TaxExempt>false</acr2:TaxExempt>\r </acr1:Token>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: UseToken (Sale)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: UseToken (Auth)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Auth</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: UseToken (Credit)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Credit</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteCardToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:DeleteCardToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TokenId>${AddCardToken#Response#declare namespace tem='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace acr1='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //tem:AddCardTokenResponse[1]/tem:AddCardTokenResult[1]/acr1:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:DeleteCardToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
